MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH45 postcode area of Wallasey, affecting properties in Warwick Drive, Seabank Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware at 1:09PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of work involved and our team is now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6PM on Saturday 23rd January 2021.
